fxmod.options.title: FauxMod Options
fxmod.options.keybind.name: Open FXMod Settings
fxmod.options.mod_default.button.tooltip: §cWARNING!§f This will reset all options to their default values.§r
fxmod.mod.fullbright.name: Fullbright
fxmod.mod.fullbright.tooltip: Removes the concept of darkness from your world.
fxmod.mod.beeesp.name: BeeESP
fxmod.mod.beeesp.tooltip: Highlights beehives within a 30 block radius
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.name: Tool Warning
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.tooltip: When your tool gets close to breaking, a message will appear.
fxmod.mod.notoolbreak.name: No Tool Breaking
fxmod.mod.notoolbreak.tooltip: Stops you from using a tool once it hits 2 durability (overriden by keybind)
fxmod.mod.toolwarning.popup.mainhand: Main hand tool has %d durability left
